function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Diverse impact of pandemic response measures on individuals and households due to local and national policies","Impact":"Unequal effects on different groups of people, leading to potential disparity in health outcomes","Mitigation":"Implement tailored measures that address the specific needs of different demographic groups, and ensure equitable access to resources and support","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for demographic variables, targeted communication platforms for tailored messaging","People":"Individuals, households, and communities","Owner":"Health authorities, community organizations, local and national governments"},{"Description":"Exacerbation of existing social and economic inequalities due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Worsening of energy poverty and other societal inequalities, leading to increased vulnerability and health risks","Mitigation":"Implement policies and programs that address economic disparities, provide support for vulnerable populations, and ensure equitable access to essential resources","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for identifying vulnerable populations, social support platforms for delivering aid and services","People":"Vulnerable populations, disadvantaged communities","Owner":"Social welfare organizations, government agencies, non-profit organizations"}]}
